title: TypeTrust releases Breuer Condensed by Silas Dilworth
content:
Breuer Condensed is now available at TypeTrust...

[http://typetrust.com/font/breuercondensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019214639/http:/typetrust.com/font/breuercondensed)

[...and here's a PDF specimen](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019214639/http:/www.typetrust.com/fonts/specimen_pdfs/TypeTrust_BreuerCondensed.pdf)

The full eight font family is on sale through the end of June... a 20% discount.
